metadata.title: CVE-2020-13614 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ssl.c in Axel before 2.17.8. The TLSimplementation lacks hostname verification.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13614` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

axel - 2.17.5-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: axel package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.17.5-1ubuntu1+esm1').
